name: Tropius
description: The Fruit Pokémon. Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of Tropius. This Pokémon flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: Damage rolls for this Pokémon get an additional +2 during harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: At the end of this Pokémon's turn, if it used a berry, roll 1d4. On a result of 3 or 4, it regains that berry as a held item.
